articles.title: 'Godzilla Minus One' Is Coming To Netflix This Weekend, But There's A Catch - Forbes
articles.description: The best Godzilla movie in years is about to release on streaming.
articles.content:
Godzilla Minus One
Credit: Toho Co. Ltd
One of the best movies of 2023 is finally coming to streaming this weekend.
Godzilla Minus One is a low-budget, extremely well-made monster movie that puts … [+1100 chars]

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin Reunite with Their Two Kids at Son Moses' High School Graduation - PEOPLE
articles.description: Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin reunited at their 18-year-old son Moses' high school graduation, posing for pictures together. Paltrow was seen hugging Moses while Martin shared a laugh with Apple outside the venue.
articles.content:
Gwyneth Paltrow and Chris Martin are reuniting to celebrate their son Moses graduation from high school.
Both Paltrow and Martin were photographed as they came together on Thursday, May 30, to congr… [+2129 chars]
